content.text: Good, thanks for asking. I'm a little sad today, actually. My dog died last week.
Oh, no. I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. I lost my dog a few years ago and I still miss him every day.
Thanks. It's hard to lose a furry friend.
It is. But they give us so much joy while they're here.
Yeah, they do. I'm just glad I had him for 15 years.
That's a long time. You were lucky to have him for so long.
I know. I'm going to miss him so much.
I'm sure you will. But he'll always be with you in your heart.
No problem. I'm here for you if you need anything.
